co.paralleluniverse.data.record

Class Field<R,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.data.record.Field<R,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The RecordType
    V - The field type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Field.ArrayField, Field.ScalarField

    public abstract class Field<R,V>
extends Object
    A record's field.

      • id

        public final int id()
        The field's id. Ids are unique for fields of the same type in the same RecordType.
        Returns:
        the field's id
